name: Crimson Dawn
description:
Crimson Dawn is a casual roguelike game about slaying hordes of monsters, upgrades and leveling different characters, weapons and spells.



Slay, survive, enchant.
Recruit a mercenary, choose weapons and spells. Slay thousands of monsters. Do all that you can to complete the mission and return home with a reward. Craft new weapons and spells, enchant the ones that you have. Repeat.



  • Slay hordes of monsters with 10 different weapons, each with unique passive ability
  • Upgrade weapons and spells in battle
  • Hire and level up your characters
  • Craft new weapons and enchant the ones that you have
  • Survive different circumstances and enviroments
  • Overcome all odds and complete 40 achievements
